caption.p: Validation of luciferase-based viral entry assay. (A) Minimal input luciferase activity after 5 min infection at RT. Luciferase activity in cells infected for 5 min at RT was significantly lower than infection for 2 h at 37°C. **** indicates an unpaired t-test p-value < 0.0001. (B) PA104 does not impact luciferase enzyme activity. No difference observed in RLU values in the presence of three concentrations of PA104. Both graphs show mean values ± SEM.
